Function reference

Import Data

create_toxEval()
Load and check toxEval data

ToxCast Data

Data provided in the package from ToxCast database.

end_point_info
Endpoint information from ToxCast
ToxCast_ACC
ACC values included with toxEval.
tox_chemicals
ToxCast Chemical Information

Clean Data

Functions to prepare data for analysis

clean_endPoint_info()
clean_endPoint_info
get_ACC()
Get the ACC values for a selection of chemicals
get_chemical_summary()
Compute EAR values
get_concentration_summary()
Create concentration summary
remove_flags()
Remove endpoints with specific data quality flags from data
filter_groups()
Filter endPoints based on groups and assays.
graph_chem_data() tox_boxplot_data() side_by_side_data()
Prepare boxplot data

Visualize Data

Functions to create graphs and tables of output.

plot_chemical_boxplots() plot_tox_boxplots()
Grouped Boxplots
plot_tox_endpoints()
EndPoint boxplots
plot_tox_stacks()
Plot stacked bar charts
plot_tox_heatmap()
Plot EAR heat maps
hits_summary_DT() hits_summary()
Summary of hits per site/category
hits_by_groupings_DT() hits_by_groupings()
Biological hits per category
rank_sites_DT() rank_sites()
Rank sites by EAR
endpoint_hits_DT() endpoint_hits()
Rank endpoints by category
make_tox_map() map_tox_data()
Create an interactive map of the data
explore_endpoints()
Explore data in the Shiny Application
plot_tox_endpoints2()
EndPoint boxplots with faceting option

Utility Functions

Functions to help

toxEval-package
Analyze ToxCast data in relation to measured concentrations.
summary(<toxEval>)
Summary of tox_list
as.toxEval()
toxEval helper functions
